bVisible: Should any be mesh elements be shown
bShowBorders: Should mesh boundary edges be shown
bShowUVSeams: Should mesh uv seam edges be shown
bShowNormalSeams: Should mesh normal seam edges be shown
bShowTangentSeams: Should mesh tangent seam edges be shown
bShowColorSeams: Should mesh color seam edges be shown
UVSeamColor: Color of mesh UV seam edges
NormalSeamColor: Color of mesh normal seam edges
TangentSeamColor: Color of mesh tangent seam edges
ColorSeamColor: Color of mesh color seam edges
DepthBias: depth bias used to slightly shift depth of lines
